alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 13 at 9:46AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Orleans, Western Chittenden, Lamoille, Western Addison, Western Rutland, Eastern Franklin, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will begin to subside by mid day but it will remain breezy through the afternoon hours. There have been numerous power outages reported across the region so be sure to exercise caution when venturing outside.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Chittenden; Western Rutland
